newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Gudang Garam falls on theft report.
newsitem.headline: Gudang Garam falls on theft report.

text.p: Share prices of blue chip cigarette maker PT Gudang Garam were down 3.1 percent at the midday break on Monday following a report in Media Indonesia newspaper that a company official had allegedly stolen 24 billion rupiah ($10 million), brokers said.
The stock was down 325 rupiah at 10,325 on volume of 193,500 shares. A Gudang Garam official said he was unable to confirm the newspaper report.
"We might submit a report to Bapepam (stock exchange supervisory agency) soon about the matter," he said.
Media Indonesia said the company's suspicions were aroused after the official failed to return from a Moslem holiday.
